item.title: Let's make a nix/guix
item.description: Let’s create on ourself. For each of use let’s go with starlark for the config language. Starlark is a subset of python and should hopefully be easy for others to learn. We’ll need to figure out how to build the seed. The first executable that will start building other libraries. We’ll need a libc and a compiler. glibc and clang TODO look at seeds for guix/nix/others Let’s pick x and y.
